name: Sentinel island
description: his image shows the controls, if they are not comfortable please comment so we can take it into account, this project is under development, I want to extend it more and go deeper into the story. Since when you play it you will notice a certain similarity in my games, this month I am going to set up a forum commenting on my idea and a little look at what I would like to reach, I hope you enjoy this game, thank you very much for taking the time to read. And remember when you consider that no key works "PRESS Z" that's my phrase
